login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Access your learning space
login.termsPrefix: By logging in, you accept our

footer.description: Elite training for future financial market professionals.

hero.description: Elite training for finance students who want to master the pricing methods used daily by professionals.

approach.title: Our pedagogical approach
approach.description: Training designed by market professionals to prepare future talents to excel in this demanding field.

pragmatic.title: Pragmatic
pragmatic.description: Methods and techniques directly applicable in a professional environment. No theory without practical application.

tech.title: Tech-friendly
tech.description: Master the technological tools used in trading floors (Python, Excel, Bloomberg, etc).

job.title: Job-oriented
job.description: Our program is designed in collaboration with recruiters to maximize your employability.

certified.title: Certified
certified.description: Obtain a certification recognized by industry professionals, validating your technical skills.

curriculum.title: Training curriculum
curriculum.description: A structured and progressive program to master essential pricing skills.

blackScholes.title: Black-Scholes & Fundamental Models
blackScholes.description: Master the basics of vanilla option pricing and understand the assumptions underlying standard models.

volatility.title: Implied Volatility & Surfaces
volatility.description: Analyze volatility structures, calibrate models and interpret market signals.

exotic.title: Exotic Derivatives & Path-dependent
exotic.description: Pricing techniques for Asian options, barriers, and autocallable products.

greeks.title: Greeks & Hedging Strategies
greeks.description: Manage the risk of your positions with a deep understanding of sensitivities.

monteCarlo.title: Monte Carlo for Pricing
monteCarlo.description: Implement Monte Carlo simulations to value complex derivative products.

stressTesting.title: Stress Testing & Scenarios
stressTesting.description: Anticipate extreme market movements and their impacts on your valuations.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: What our former students say after completing our training.

alexandre.quote: I was able to join an equity derivatives desk thanks to the skills acquired on The Pricing Lab. The difference between this training and my theoretical courses at university was striking.
alexandre.author: Alexandre M.

sarah.quote: The technical aspect and rigor of this training allowed me to stand out during job interviews. I now have an edge over my colleagues from prestigious schools.
sarah.author: Sarah K.

thomas.quote: My manager was impressed by my ability to understand pricing mechanisms from day one. This training is an investment that has already been paid for by my first-year bonus.
thomas.author: Thomas D.

cta.title: Ready to transform your career?
cta.description: Unlimited access to all our modules, tools and challenges for only €19/month. Minimal investment, maximum impact on your professional future.

coursesPage.title: Training Modules
coursesPage.subtitle: A structured pedagogical progression from fundamentals to advanced pricing techniques used on trading floors.

fundamentals.description: The essential basics to understand pricing mechanisms and build solid expertise.

blackScholes.title: Introduction to Pricing and Black-Scholes
blackScholes.description: The essential basics to understand option pricing mechanisms.

yieldCurves.title: Interest Rates and Yield Curves
yieldCurves.description: Understanding and modeling yield curves for valuation.

greeks.title: Greeks and Sensitivities
greeks.description: Master risk measures and hedging techniques.

advanced.description: Sophisticated techniques for valuing and managing vanilla products in complex environments.

impliedVol.title: Implied Volatility and Structures
impliedVol.description: Analyze and interpret market volatility surfaces.

volProducts.title: Volatility Products
volProducts.description: Master volatility indices and their derivatives.

complex.description: Master pricing methods for structured and exotic products.

exotic.title: Exotic Options and Barriers
exotic.description: Pricing complex derivative products with discontinuities.

monteCarlo.title: Monte Carlo for Path-dependent Products
monteCarlo.description: Advanced simulation techniques for path-dependent options.

cta.title: Access all modules
cta.description: Unlock all content and progress at your own pace with The Pricing Lab monthly subscription.

projects.title: Challenges & Projects
projects.subtitle: Test your knowledge with our practical challenges and compare your results with other community members.
projects.communityDescription: Participate in our monthly challenges and exchange with other quantitative finance enthusiasts. The subscription gives access to all challenges and premium resources.
projects.optionPricingDesc: Develop the most accurate pricer for a portfolio of stock options.
projects.monteCarloDesc: Use Monte Carlo methods to evaluate exotic options and compare your results to benchmarks.
projects.portfolioOptDesc: Build an optimal portfolio under different constraints and risk metrics.
projects.volSurfaceDesc: Calibrate volatility models to market option prices and reconstruct the complete surface.
projects.algoTradingDesc: Develop a volatility-based algorithmic trading strategy and evaluate its performance.
